name: Sparky's Hunt (itch)
description:
Vote for the game if you like it on greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=687068641

You return home as usual late from work when you hear of strange spirits invading people's homes looking for something. Sadly your home is the next home they will visit, you don't know what they want but you have to keep your home from being invaded by scaring them away.

Survive the week and don't get killed.
